identity.name: Meowls e-Visa Portal
identity.description: A government portal that balances authority with modern usability. It avoids the 'startup' look in favor of a 'better government' aesthetic.
principles: Clarity over Creativity: Forms must be boringly predictable.
Trust through Typography: Serif headings for authority.
Feedback is King: Every action has a clear state change.
Accessibility First: High contrast, clear labels, keyboard navigable.

colors.theme_strategy: Light Mode Only (Government Standard). Dark mode is optional but default should be Light for trust.

grids.landing: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-8 (Mode A: Tetris)
grids.dashboard: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-6 (Mode B: High Density)

containers.card: bg-white border border-slate-200 shadow-sm rounded-lg p-6

buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800 rounded-md px-6 py-3 font-medium transition-all shadow-sm hover:shadow-md
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-900 border border-slate-300 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-md px-6 py-3 font-medium transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:text-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-100 rounded-md px-4 py-2

inputs.default: flex h-12 w-full rounded-md border border-slate-300 bg-white px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-slate-400 focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-slate-900 focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

cards.feature: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-xl border border-slate-200 bg-white p-8 hover:border-slate-300 transition-all hover:shadow-lg
cards.status: flex items-center justify-between p-4 rounded-lg border

visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-md for dropdowns, shadow-xl for modals
visual_enhancers.radius: rounded-md (6px) for inputs/buttons, rounded-xl (12px) for cards
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise texture on the main background to give a 'paper' feel.

images.description: Majestic Mountain Lake - The scenic beauty of Meowls

structure: Hero Section: 'Welcome to Meowls e-Visa Portal' with background image and clear 'Apply Now' CTA.
Info Grid: 3-column grid explaining Visa Types (Tourist, Business, Medical).
Process Steps: Horizontal timeline showing 'Apply -> Upload -> Track -> Fly'.
Footer: Official government links and disclaimers.
Split Layout: Left side form (Login/Register), Right side image (Scenic Meowls).
Google OAuth Button: Prominent, top of form.
Stepper: Top progress bar (Personal -> Travel -> Documents -> Review).
Form Layout: Single column max-width-3xl for focus.
Document Upload: Drag and drop zones with preview.
Application List: Table with Status Badges (Pending=Yellow, Approved=Green, Rejected=Red).
Data Table: Dense list of applications with filters.
Review Modal: Split screen (Application details left, Document preview right).

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Merriweather' for all Headings (h1-h3) to give that official government look.
Use 'Inter' for all body text and form inputs for maximum readability.
Implement the 'Diplomatic Blue' (#0F172A) as the primary brand color.
Ensure all forms have client-side validation with clear error messages.
Use Shadcn UI components for complex interactive elements (Select, Datepicker, Dialog).
Do NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle textures.
Ensure the 'Status Tracker' is visually distinct and easy to understand.
For the Admin Panel, prioritize information density (Mode B grid).
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for sticky headers only.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
